description: Enable or disable monitoring alerts on hosts in SolarWinds.

nodes.description: List of hostnames or IP addresses for nodes in SolarWinds that will have monitoring alerts either enabled or disabled.

name_property.description: Property to use when looking up nodes. By default we check to see if the node is an IP address, if it is then we use the 'IPAddress' property, otherwise we use 'DNS'. If you want to change what the 'other' property is when the node name isn't an IP address, then specify this property.

action.description: Action to perform on monitored nodes. 'enable' will enable monitoring alerts. 'disable' will disable monitoring alerts on nodes.
